title: The Step-By-Step Process to Finding Your 'Why' | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.  If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.  Come say hi and see Tom and the Impact Theory team at New York Comic-con 2018, October 4th to October 7th, Booth #236. Just announced our Comic Book collaboration with Steve Aoki, called Neon Future! Pre-order your copy of the comic book here: comics.impacttheory.com Be sure to follow along with Impact Theory Comics on Instagram as we continue our journey to create a studio that will rival Disney: http://bit.ly/2BwgFam   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: Sanebox. Visit sanebox.com/IMPACT to sign up for your 14-day free trial and receive a $25 credit. SaneBox brings sanity back to your inbox by prioritizing what's important, removing spam/junk, grouping newsletters together, and automating tedious tasks. Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   QUESTION TOPICS How to overcome social awkwardness and overcoming limiting beliefs [00:27] Tom goes through, step-by-step, how to get over from feeling lost and overwhelmed with your goals and life [6:51] How to have the hard conversations with your superior in a work environment [19:45] Is there a balance between the skills that Tom has mastered vs. skills he hasn't? [24:30] Why you aren't too old to jump back into anything you used to love to do [27:14]
